H0.text: Pneumonia caused by microorganisms is a health condition that is an infectious disease.

H1.text: Heart problem caused by a high-fat diet is a health condition that is not an infectious disease.

H2.text: Lung cancer caused by smoking is not an infectious disease.

H3.text: Eye damage caused by ultraviolet light is the health condition that is an infectious disease.

A4.text: Pneumonia is due to infections caused primarily by bacteria or viruses and less commonly by fungi and parasites.

A5.text: Mixed infections with both viruses and bacteria may occur in roughly 45% of infections in children and 15% of infections in adults.
